body_text: Oh, right. Does that mean that my suggestion for a test would require testing server-to-client interaction? That might be a bit much... I don't know why I missed that the file wasn't in the add-on - maybe the client part of the path threw me off.
body: Oh, right. Does that mean that my suggestion for a test would require testing server-to-client interaction? That might be a bit much... I don't know why I missed that the file wasn't in the add-on - maybe the `client` part of the path threw me off.
body_html: Oh, right. Does that mean that my suggestion for a test would require testing server-to-client interaction? That might be a bit much... I don't know why I missed that the file wasn't in the add-on - maybe the client part of the path threw me off.
